sect2.title: Change in URL of Internal cf-usb Broker Endpoint
sect2.para: This change is only applicable for upgrades from ∩ 1.2.1 to ∩ 1.3 and upgrades from ∩ 1.3 to ∩ 1.3.1. The URL of the internal cf-usb broker endpoint has changed. Brokers for PostgreSQL and MySQL that use cf-usb will require the following manual fix after upgrading to reconnect with SCF/CAP:

step.para: Get the name of the secret (for example secrets-2.14.5-1):
Get the URL of the cf-usb host (for example https://cf-usb.scf.svc.cluster.local:24054):
Get the current cf-usb password. Use the name of the secret obtained in the first step:
step.screen: &prompt.user;kubectl get secret --namespace scf secrets-2.14.5-1 -o yaml | grep \\scf-usb-password: | cut -d: -f2 | base64 -id

step.para: Update the service broker, where password is the password from the previous step, and the URL is the result of the second step with the leading cf-usb part doubled with a dash separator
Get the name of the secret (for example secrets-2.15.2-1):
Get the URL of the cf-usb host (for example https://cf-usb-cf-usb.scf.svc.cluster.local:24054):
Get the current cf-usb password. Use the name of the secret obtained in the first step:
step.screen: &prompt.user;kubectl get secret --namespace scf secrets-2.15.2-1 -o yaml | grep \\scf-usb-password: | cut -d: -f2 | base64 -id
